channel.title: Apply on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in Apply on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: Mapply: When You Need to Iterate Over Multiple Inputs
item.description: Learn when and how to use mapply for applying functions with multiple varying arguments. This guide shows practical examples of processing data when you need to pair multiple inputs element-wise.

item.title: Let's Get Apply'ing
item.description: Learn to replace loops with vectorized apply functions in R for efficient data manipulation. This guide covers converting loops to functions using sapply and mapply, enhancing your programming skills by making code more readable and less error-prone.
